title: What is JavaScript?
summary: JavaScript is a programming language used to make web pages interactive.
content: JavaScript is a dynamic language used for web development, games, and apps. It runs in the browser and on the server using Node.js.

title: Intro to React
summary: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
content: React allows developers to build reusable UI components. It uses a virtual DOM and works great for SPAs.

title: Understanding APIs
summary: APIs allow different software components to communicate with each other.
content: APIs enable interaction between different software services. They define protocols for requests and responses, typically over HTTP.
